medical_history.chief_complaint: Right sided abdominal pain with nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Right sided abdominal pain onset 2 days prior to consultation, with nausea, diarrhea, chills, and sweats but without fevers. The severity of the pain was much worse compared to several prior episodes which were mild.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypercholesterolemia, Hypothyroidism, Colonic adenoma, Osteoporosis, Hypertension, Overweight, Endometrial cancer, Neuropathy, Pneumonia due to methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus, Empyema lung, Infection due to strongyloides, Pulmonary embolism, Chronic kidney disease (CKD), stage III (moderate), Pancytopenia, Radiation cystitis.
